title: User Signup with valid email and password
description: Verify that a new user can successfully sign up with a valid email and a password meeting the requirements.

steps.description: Enter a valid password that meets length and complexity requirements
User is created and redirected to dashboard

title: User Signup with invalid email format
description: Verify signup is rejected with an invalid email format.

steps.description: Display error message indicating invalid email format, prevent signup

title: User Signup with weak password
description: Verify signup is rejected when the password does not meet complexity or length requirements.

steps.description: Enter a password weaker than policy (e.g., too short)
Display password strength or requirements error and disallow signup

title: User Login with valid credentials
description: Validate successful login using registered email and correct password.

steps.description: User is authenticated and redirected to dashboard

title: User Login with invalid credentials
description: Verify login fails with incorrect email/password combination.

steps.description: Display authentication failure message and remain on login page

title: Logout functionality
description: Ensure user can successfully logout and no longer has access to protected pages.

steps.description: User session is cleared and redirected to login page
Attempt to access dashboard or editor page after logout
Access denied and redirected to login page

title: Create new document from dashboard
description: Verify user can create a new document with a specified title from dashboard and document appears in list.

steps.description: New document is listed in dashboard documents list

title: Create new document with empty title
description: Verify document creation is prevented when title is empty or whitespace.

steps.description: Click to create a new document
Leave title field empty or fill with whitespace only

title: Delete existing document from dashboard
description: Verify that a user can delete a document from the dashboard and it no longer appears in the list.

steps.description: Click delete button or icon for the document
Confirm the delete action when prompted
Document is removed from dashboard list

title: Dashboard empty state display
description: Verify dashboard shows a friendly empty state message or UI when user has no documents.

steps.description: Login with a user having zero documents
Empty state UI or message is displayed clearly prompting user to create documents

title: Edit document title in editor
description: Verify user can edit the document title from the editor page and changes are saved.

steps.description: Login and open an existing document in editor
Wait for auto-save or trigger save
Title change persists and is updated in database

title: Rich text formatting in document editor
description: Verify that the editor's toolbar performs expected text formatting actions (bold, italics, underline, lists).

steps.description: Apply bold formatting to a portion of text
Selected text is rendered as bold

title: Auto-save triggers correctly during editing
description: Validate that document content and title are auto-saved periodically and on field changes without manual save button.

steps.description: Auto-save indicator shows saving and then saved state
Changes made prior are persisted accurately

title: Add knowledge reference to document
description: Verify user can add a knowledge reference with a label and content which becomes available for AI context.

steps.description: Fill in label and content for a new knowledge reference
Reference appears in knowledge panel list

title: Update existing knowledge reference
description: Verify that an existing knowledge reference can be updated with new label and/or content.

steps.description: Open document editor and knowledge panel

title: Delete knowledge reference from document
description: Ensure user can delete a knowledge reference and confirm its removal from AI context and knowledge panel.

steps.description: Use delete action and confirm prompt
Knowledge reference is removed from list and no longer provided to AI

title: AI Assistant quick action - Continue content
description: Validate AI generates continuation content correctly given document content and knowledge context when 'Continue' action is triggered.

steps.description: Load an editor with text content and knowledge references
AI-generated continuation is inserted and relevant to document context

title: AI Assistant quick action - Improve content
description: Verify that the 'Improve' quick action generates enhanced text based on selected text and knowledge context.

steps.description: Text is improved with correct integration of knowledge and enhanced quality

title: AI Assistant quick action - Expand content
description: Check that the AI 'Expand' action produces lengthened content relevant to the selected text and knowledge base.

steps.description: Expanded related content is inserted accurately and contextually

title: AI Assistant quick action - Summarize content
description: Verify AI produces a concise summary of selected content using knowledge context with the 'Summarize' quick action.

steps.description: Select a paragraph or section in editor
Summary text is generated reflecting key points based on selected content and knowledge

title: AI Assistant free-form chat conversation
description: Test the AI chat feature allowing user to input free-form prompts and receive contextually accurate replies based on document and knowledge.

steps.description: Enter a chat prompt related to document topic
Submit prompt and receive AI response
AI response is contextually relevant, coherent, and reflects document and knowledge references

title: Subscription flow - New user free trial and subscription activation
description: Verify that a new user is prompted for payment modal after signup, can initiate free trial, proceed through Polar checkout, and subscription status updates to active.

steps.description: Payment modal is presented on dashboard load
Start free trial through payment modal
Subscription status updates to 'active' in user profile

title: Subscription status update to canceled
description: Verify the system properly updates subscription status to 'canceled' on receiving webhook event from Polar.

steps.description: Simulate Polar webhook event for subscription canceled
System updates user subscription status to 'canceled' and reflects in UI

title: Subscription modal visibility based on subscription status
description: Check that payment modal only appears for users without active subscriptions and is hidden for active subscribers.

steps.description: Login as user without subscription or inactive subscription
Login as user with active subscription

title: Navigation flow protections for authenticated routes
description: Verify that protected routes (dashboard, editor) redirect unauthenticated users to login page.

steps.description: Attempt direct navigation to dashboard URL as unauthenticated user
User is redirected to login page
Attempt direct navigation to editor page as unauthenticated user
User is redirected to login page

title: Responsive UI behavior on different viewport sizes
description: Verify that the landing page, dashboard, and editor UI components render and function correctly on desktop, tablet, and mobile resolutions.

steps.description: Layout displays correctly without clipping or overflow
UI adapts gracefully, navigation accessible, no broken elements
Mobile UI is usable with accessible controls, menus, and no horizontal scrolling

title: Save status indicator accuracy during editing
description: Ensure the UI indicator correctly shows when document is saving, saved, or failed to save.

steps.description: Save indicator shows 'saving' during network request
Save indicator updates to 'saved' on successful save
Save indicator shows error or retry state appropriately
